definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Family Quarrel The young newly- weds quarreled.
sentences.chinese: 家庭的争吵一对年轻的新婚夫妇吵架了。

sentences.english: Many travel companies offer trips for the wedding couple to faraway places.
sentences.chinese: 许多旅行公司为新婚夫妇提供远程旅行路线。

sentences.english: Record the newly-weds honeymoon trip tips and the equipment information.
sentences.chinese: 记录新婚夫妇蜜月旅程的攻略和装备信息。

sentences.english: The newly married couple moved into their new home.
sentences.chinese: 这对新婚夫妇迁入新居。

sentences.english: These are the new homes for young marrieds.
sentences.chinese: 这些是新婚夫妇们的新房。

sentences.english: How do the newly-married couple hit it off?
sentences.chinese: 这对新婚夫妇相处得怎样？

sentences.english: The newly-weds finally finished furnishing their home.
sentences.chinese: 这对新婚夫妇最后终于把他们的家布置好了。

sentences.english: Many newly-weds like to enlarge their wedding photo and hang it on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 很多新婚夫妇喜欢把结婚照放大了挂在墙上。

sentences.english: Vases are also great to give as a gift for the marrying couple.
sentences.chinese: 花瓶也是送给新婚夫妇好的礼物。

sentences.english: Newly weds embark on the task of decorating their new house.
sentences.chinese: 新婚夫妇忙着装修自己的新房子。

sentences.english: The newlyweds ride a carriage across Westminster Bridge after their wedding ceremony on July 29, 1981.
sentences.chinese: 典礼之后新婚夫妇驾马车驶过威斯敏斯特大桥。

sentences.english: Use of the gadgets is apparently causing problems for many newlywed couples.
sentences.chinese: 使用高科技产品显然对越来越多的新婚夫妇造成问题。

sentences.english: The master of the wedding ceremony delivers a speech of congratulation to the newlyweds.
sentences.chinese: 主婚人向这对新婚夫妇致新婚贺辞。

sentences.english: Our house has been rented by a newly-married couple.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房子被一对新婚夫妇租去了。

sentences.english: This newly wedded couple are always quarreling.
sentences.chinese: 这对新婚夫妇总是吵架。

sentences.english: New couples will tie the knot in the beautiful French-style garden within the pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 而今朝，新婚夫妇将在国馆的大方的园中喜结良缘。

definition: the bride's side (of a wedding)/of the bride's party
disturbing the privacy of bridal room (Chinese custom where guests banter with and play pranks on the newlyweds)
see 鬧洞房|闹洞房[nao4 dong4 fang2]
